title: 旧约 - 箴言(Proverbs) - 第 27 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 箴言(Proverbs) -- 第 27 章 ( 本篇共有 31 章 )

lineList.en: Boast not thyself of to morrow; for thou knowest not what a day may bring forth.
lineList.cn: 不要为明日自夸，因为一日要生何事，你尚且不能知道。

lineList.en: Let another man praise thee, and not thine own mouth; a stranger, and not thine own lips.
lineList.cn: 要别人夸奖你，不可用口自夸。等外人称赞你，不可用嘴自称。

lineList.en: A stone is heavy, and the sand weighty; but a fool's wrath is heavier than them both.
lineList.cn: 石头重，沙土沉，愚妄人的恼怒，比这两样更重。

lineList.en: Wrath is cruel, and anger is outrageous; but who is able to stand before envy?
lineList.cn: 忿怒为残忍，怒气为狂澜，惟有嫉妒，谁能敌得住呢。

lineList.en: Open rebuke is better than secret love.
lineList.cn: 当面的责备，强如背地的爱情。

lineList.en: Faithful are the wounds of a friend; but the kisses of an enemy are deceitful.
lineList.cn: 朋友加的伤痕，出于忠诚，仇敌连连亲嘴，却是多馀。

lineList.en: The full soul loatheth an honeycomb; but to the hungry soul every bitter thing is sweet.
lineList.cn: 人吃饱了，厌恶蜂房的蜜。人饥饿了，一切苦物都觉甘甜。

lineList.en: As a bird that wandereth from her nest, so is a man that wandereth from his place.
lineList.cn: 人离本处飘流，好像雀鸟离窝游飞。

lineList.en: Ointment and perfume rejoice the heart: so doth the sweetness of a man's friend by hearty counsel.
lineList.cn: 膏油与香料，使人心喜悦。朋友诚实的劝教，也是如此甘美。

lineList.en: Thine own friend, and thy father's friend, forsake not; neither go into thy brother's house in the day of thy calamity: for better is a neighbour that is near than a brother far off.
lineList.cn: 你的朋友，和父亲的朋友，你都不可离弃。你遭难的日子，不要上弟兄的家去。向近的邻舍，强如远方的弟兄。

lineList.en: My son, be wise, and make my heart glad, that I may answer him that reproacheth me.
lineList.cn: 我儿，你要作智慧人，好叫我的心喜欢，使我可以回答那讥笑我的人。

lineList.en: A prudent man foreseeth the evil, and hideth himself; but the simple pass on, and are punished.
lineList.cn: 通达人见祸藏躲。愚蒙人前往受害。

lineList.en: Take his garment that is surety for a stranger, and take a pledge of him for a strange woman.
lineList.cn: 谁为生人作保，就拿谁的衣服。谁为外女作保，谁就承当。

lineList.en: He that blesseth his friend with a loud voice, rising early in the morning, it shall be counted a curse to him.
lineList.cn: 清晨起来，大声给朋友祝福的，就算是咒诅他。

lineList.en: A continual dropping in a very rainy day and a contentious woman are alike.
lineList.cn: 大雨之日连连滴漏，和争吵的妇人一样。

lineList.en: Whosoever hideth her hideth the wind, and the ointment of his right hand, which bewrayeth itself.
lineList.cn: 想拦阻他的，便是拦阻风，也是右手抓油。

lineList.en: Iron sharpeneth iron; so a man sharpeneth the countenance of his friend.
lineList.cn: 铁磨铁，磨出刃来。朋友相感，（原文作磨朋友的脸）也是如此。

lineList.en: Whoso keepeth the fig tree shall eat the fruit thereof: so he that waiteth on his master shall be honoured.
lineList.cn: 看守无花果树的，必吃树上的果子。敬奉主人的，必得尊荣。

lineList.en: As in water face answereth to face, so the heart of man to man.
lineList.cn: 水中照脸，彼此相符。人与人，心也相对。

lineList.en: Hell and destruction are never full; so the eyes of man are never satisfied.
lineList.cn: 阴间和灭亡，永不满足。人的眼目，也是如此。

lineList.en: As the fining pot for silver, and the furnace for gold; so is a man to his praise.
lineList.cn: 鼎为炼银，炉为炼金，人的称赞也试炼人。

lineList.en: Though thou shouldest bray a fool in a mortar among wheat with a pestle, yet will not his foolishness depart from him.
lineList.cn: 你虽用杵，将愚妄人与打碎的麦子一同捣在臼中，他的愚妄还是离不了他。

lineList.en: Be thou diligent to know the state of thy flocks, and look well to thy herds.
lineList.cn: 你要详细知道你羊群的景况。留心料理你的牛群。

lineList.en: For riches are not for ever: and doth the crown endure to every generation?
lineList.cn: 因为赀财不能永有。冠冕岂能存到万代。

lineList.en: The hay appeareth, and the tender grass sheweth itself, and herbs of the mountains are gathered.
lineList.cn: 乾草割去，嫩草发现，山上的菜蔬，也被收敛。

lineList.en: The lambs are for thy clothing, and the goats are the price of the field.
lineList.cn: 羊羔之毛，是为你作衣服。山羊是为作田地的价值。

lineList.en: And thou shalt have goats' milk enough for thy food, for the food of thy household, and for the maintenance for thy maidens.
lineList.cn: 有母山羊奶够你吃，也够你的家眷吃，且够养你的婢女。
